scripts.postdeploy: echo $DATABSE_URL; python ap/makeallmigrations.py && python ap/manage.py migrate --noinput && python ap/manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python ap/manage.py populate && echo "from accounts.models import User; User.objects.filter(email='$ADMIN_EMAIL').delete(); User.objects.create_superuser('$ADMIN_EMAIL', '$ADMIN_PASSWORD')" | python ap/manage.py shell

DJANGO_SECRET_KEY.description: A randomly generated secret to secure your Django installation
